front.description: CANONICAL front-view portrait of Morgath. This is the definitive reference for this character's face and identity. Devastatingly beautiful real human woman, appears early 40s. Porcelain-pale skin with natural texture. Large dark nearly-black eyes with no warmth. High sharp cheekbones. Full crimson lips. Long straight raven-black hair falling heavy like a curtain. Tall, slender. Wears a fitted black gown with high structured collar embroidered with dark crimson thread. A blood-red jewel hangs on a gold chain around her neck.

side.description: Side-view portrait of Morgath showing profile and body shape. Porcelain-pale skin, large dark nearly-black eyes, high sharp cheekbones, long straight raven-black hair. Tall, slender.

back.description: Back-view portrait of Morgath showing hair, clothing, and silhouette from behind. Long straight raven-black hair falling heavy like a curtain. Fitted black gown.
